name: EasyScript
description: The fastest way to build up and run your script
author: Roman Zhernosek <zhernosek.roman@gmail.com>
keywords: easy way to run js script
easy way to run js scripts
fast and easy run js script
fast and easy run js scripts

scripts.helloworld: babel lib/install.js | EASYSCRIPT=helloworld node && { babel lib/index.js && babel scripts/helloworld.js; } | EASYSCRIPT=helloworld node
